import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { return (
{ featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating}{totalRating===0 ?( "Not Rated" ):( ({reviews.length}))}
{title}
${price} /per person
) } export default TourCard
